acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in a POJO with basic jvm types
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldGenerateBasicTypes

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.OneDimensionalTestPojo

Then the Object OneDimensionalTestPojo ( booleanField = true booleanObjectField = true byteField = 17 byteObjectField = 46 shortField = 9 shortObjectField = 115 charField = m charObjectField = z intField = -1132728813 intObjectField = -1534735345 longField = 232810172326929 longObjectField = 232810170900810 floatField = 0.43116653 floatObjectField = 0.97758627 doubleField = 0.001466244175425846 doubleObjectField = 0.24296384537084736 stringField = 0mbBVRM2I_ objectField = java.lang.Object@4dac863d calendarField = Sun May 31 21:30:02 BST 2015 dateField = Sun May 31 21:30:02 BST 2015 randomArray = [Ljava.util.Random;@503308de intArray = [I@482bdb02 booleanArray = [Z@ac64dd0 bigDecimalField = 418357140053 ) should not be null
Then the Pojo should contain some data
